switch.text: 实基带信号 x(t) 频谱

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 258px; margin-left: 10px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

switch.text: 复基带信号 xa(t) 频谱

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 498px; margin-left: 10px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

switch.text: 复通带信号 ra(t) 频谱

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 738px; margin-left: 10px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

switch.text: 实通带信号 r(t) 频谱

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 998px; margin-left: 10px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 15px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

switch.text: 基带信号 x'(t) 频谱

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 658px; margin-left: 9px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
取实部（上边带），发射出去
r(t) = Re{ra(t)}

switch.text: 取实部（上边带），发射出去 r(t) = Re{ra(t)}

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 418px; margin-left: 9px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span:
调制到复载波上
ra(t) = xa(t) exp{j2πfct}

switch.text: 调制到复载波上 ra(t) = xa(t) exp{j2πfct}

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 178px; margin-left: 9px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span:
通过希尔伯特变换，转为解析信号
xa(t) = x(t) + j (x(t) * hh(t))

switch.text: 通过希尔伯特变换，转为解析信号 xa(t) = x(t) + j (x(t) * hh(t))

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 918px; margin-left: 9px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span:
接收机对其作相干解调
x'(t) = r(t) cos(2πfct)

switch.text: 接收机对其作相干解调 x'(t) = r(t) cos(2πfct)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 76px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1027px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
